scripts.postinstall: yarn elm:install; mv node_modules/.bin/elm-make node_modules/.bin/elm-make-original; cp elm-make node_modules/.bin/
scripts.cleaninstall: yarn add rimraf && rimraf node_modules elm-stuff && yarn install && yarn elm:install
scripts.reinstall: npm i rimraf && rimraf node_modules && npm uninstall -g elm && npm i -g elm && npm i && elm package install
